workouts.name: Warm-up
workouts.description: 5-10 minutes of light cardio to get your blood flowing

workouts.name: Squats
workouts.description: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and lower your body down until your thighs are parallel to the ground

workouts.name: Lunges
workouts.description: Step out with one foot and lower your body down until your back knee is almost touching the ground

workouts.name: Push-ups
workouts.description: Start in a plank position and lower your body down until your chest almost touches the ground

workouts.name: Warm-up
workouts.description: 5-10 minutes of light cardio to get your blood flowing

workouts.name: Deadlifts
workouts.description: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and lift a weight up off the ground, keeping your back straight

workouts.name: Bench Dips
workouts.description: Sit on the edge of a bench and lower your body down by bending your elbows

workouts.name: Chest Press
workouts.description: Lie on a flat bench and press a weight up off your chest

workouts.name: Warm-up
workouts.description: 5-10 minutes of light cardio to get your blood flowing

workouts.name: Leg Press
workouts.description: Sit in a leg press machine and push the platform away from you

workouts.name: Calf Raises
workouts.description: Stand on a step or platform and raise up onto your tiptoes

workouts.name: Seated Row
workouts.description: Sit in a seated row machine and pull the bar towards your chest

workouts.name: Warm-up
workouts.description: 5-10 minutes of light cardio to get your blood flowing

workouts.name: Shoulder Press
workouts.description: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and press a weight straight up over your head

workouts.name: Lateral Raises
workouts.description: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and raise a weight out to the sides until they are at shoulder height

workouts.name: Tricep Extensions
workouts.description: Hold a weight overhead with both hands and lower it behind your head

workouts.name: Warm-up
workouts.description: 5-10 minutes of light cardio to get your blood flowing

workouts.name: Bicep Curls
workouts.description: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and curl a weight up towards your shoulders

workouts.name: Tricep Dips
workouts.description: Sit on the edge of a bench and lower your body down by bending your elbows

workouts.name: Chest Flyes
workouts.description: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a weight in each hand, then lift the weight out to the sides until they are at shoulder height

workouts.name: Warm-up
workouts.description: 5-10 minutes of light cardio to get your blood flowing

workouts.name: Deadlifts
workouts.description: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and lift a weight up off the ground, keeping your back straight

workouts.name: Bench Press
workouts.description: Lie on a flat bench and press a weight up off your chest

workouts.name: Leg Extensions
workouts.description: Sit in a leg extension machine and lift the weight up off the ground

workouts.name: Warm-up
workouts.description: 5-10 minutes of light cardio to get your blood flowing

workouts.name: Chest Press
workouts.description: Lie on a flat bench and press a weight up off your chest

workouts.name: Seated Row
workouts.description: Sit in a seated row machine and pull the bar towards your chest

workouts.name: Shoulder Rotations
workouts.description: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a weight in each hand, then rotate your shoulders in a circular motion
